body_html:
@timshen91 Please find the revised PR. Instead of changing AlgorithmDesc I now add one member variable algorithm_scratch_size in AlgorithmConfig. It would be used to keep the size of scratch memory for the best algorithm with scratch memory. Convolution operators in TF have also been changed to see show how the new interface is used.

Please notice algorithm_scratch_size is set in this PR but not read actually as it's not required for CuDNN. For MIOpen integration logic the field would be used, and would be submitted in a separate PR after prerequisites such as #20277 is accepted and merged.

body:
@timshen91 Please find the revised PR. Instead of changing `AlgorithmDesc` I now add one member variable `algorithm_scratch_size` in `AlgorithmConfig`. It would be used to keep the size of scratch memory for the best algorithm with scratch memory. Convolution operators in TF have also been changed to see show how the new interface is used.

Please notice `algorithm_scratch_size` is set in this PR but not read actually as it's not required for CuDNN. For MIOpen integration logic the field would be used, and would be submitted in a separate PR after prerequisites such as #20277 is accepted and merged.
